title: Game keeps disconnecting in middle of game. Unable to get back into game
body:
I was looking for help on this subject. I do enjoy playing the game, however, when you can't even get past 5 minutes in the game it is really discouraging.

So here is the issue. I am able to go through champ select and the loading screen. At this point I have no idea when the game will crash. Sometimes it is five minutes and other times 30 minutes into the game. 

I have looked on other forum posts and all i found was to make sure that you don't have lolreplay running in the background in which I don't.
I have tried reinstalling from scratch and running as admin on my computer. However, I am always running into the same disconnect issues. 
Occasionally it does give me an error about my internet, but I know my speed is at 12 mbs and the signal is fine at max bars. 

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

>the signal is fine at max bars.

Have you tried switching to a wired connection?
